item.title: Clanchat
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:2, topic:477679”]I’m guessing you have something like

player.getName() + " has joined the channel"

or

String.format("%s has entered the channel", player.getName());

What you could do is something like

public String toTitleCase(final String string) {
    char[] chars = string.toCharArray();
    chars[0] = Character.toTitleCase(chars[0]);
    return new String(chars);

}

And then do

toTitleCase(player.getName()) + " has entered the channel." [/quote]

This, you basically want to set the Default to the Channel.
